Game Rules
Beowulf
About the game Beowulf is a 5 reel, 3 row, 25 bet line video slot. The game features Stacked Wilds, the random triggered Grendel Attack, and Free Spins with the fight between Beowulf and the Dragon. Theoretical payout is 97.21%
How to play Video slots are very easy to play. Just follow these 3 steps:
1. Choose your total bet 2. Press the SPIN symbol button 3. Check for any win in the WIN field
For more understanding of Settings, Game Rules, and Game Features read the text below.
Description of game functionality
Bet The Total bet is shown in the TOTAL BET display. Change the bet by clicking on the display and choosing the total bet of your choice. The Total Bet is based on the bet per line multiplied with the number of bet lines active. The FEATURE BET is always played and enabled the Grendel Feature. The total bet with the FEATURE BET enabled is the basic bet (the number of bet lines multiplied by the bet per line) plus 5 times the bet per line. As such the TOTAL BET is 30 x the BET PER LINE
Spin The game is started by pressing the SPIN symbol button. You can Quick Stop the game by pressing the SPIN symbol button again.
Win Any total win in a game round will be displayed in the WIN field All wins are multiplied by the bet per line. Bet line wins pay in succession from leftmost to right. Only the highest win per active bet line is paid. Each individual bet line win will be displayed on their bet line as the wins are presented.
Paytable All winning combinations in the game can be viewed in the PAYTABLE.
Fast Play The FAST PLAY functionality is used to get the shortest game round possible. The duration of game rounds may vary depending on bandwidth and server response time.
Autoplay Autoplay allows you to play a number of game rounds automatically Press AUTOPLAY and choose a number of game rounds to initiate Autoplay. The remaining number of spins is displayed to the right of the STOP button. Autoplay is stopped by pressing the STOP button.
Settings In the settings panel at the bottom left of the game you can choose: Use SPACE for spin Use SPACE for spin allows you to use your Space Bar on your keyboard to initiate game rounds.
Show Splash Screen on startup This setting allows you to switch the games Splash Screen on and off.
Special symbols
Wild Symbols The game has four different types of Wild Symbols: - Stacked Wilds, appear in main game and substitute for all symbols except Bonus Scatter, Grendel Attack symbol, Sword Wild symbol, and Dragon Wild Symbol. - Grendel Attack Wild, appear in Grendel Attack and substitute for all symbols except Bonus Scatter, Sword Wild symbol, and Dragon Wild Symbol. - Sword Wild symbol, appear in free spins and substitute for all symbols except Dragon Wild symbol. - Dragon Wild symbol, appear in free spins and substitute for all symbols except Sword Wild symbol.
Scatter Symbols Scatter symbols are not bound to bet lines. The game has two different Scatter symbols: Free Spins Scatter symbols appear in the main game. Three or more symbols will initiate the Free Spins Bonus. Three Scatters pay 3 x the bet, Four Scatter symbols pay 10 x the bet, Five Scatters pay 20 x the bet. Scatter wins are added to payline wins. Grendel Attack Scatter symbols appear in the Grendel Attack. Each symbol awards one respin during the Grendel Attack Bonus.
Game Features
Stacked Wilds Wild symbols stacked on each other create the possibilities of major wins.
Grendel Attack The Grendel Attack feature appears in the Main game and is randomly triggered. The feature awards a random number of Wild symbols that will lock to their positions for a set number of respins The number of Grendel Scatter symbols that appears on reel 5 determines the number of respins.
Free Spin Dragon Fight 3+ Free Spin Scatter symbols initiates the Free Spins feature. There are no predetermined number of free spins. The Free Spins Bonus continues until the Free Spin Dragon fight has ended. For each Sword Wild symbol that appears 1 health is removed from the Dragon Health bar. The Sword Wild symbol is locked for the remainder of the free spins, or until it is removed by a Dragon Wild symbol. For each Dragon symbol that appears 1 health is removed from the Beowulf Health bar. If there are any Sword Wild symbols on the reels, the Sword Wild awarded first will be removed by the Dragon Wild, and be replaced for the payout of that specific round by a Fire Wild covering the whole reel. The Free Spins Dragon Fight ends when one of the Health Bars is empty. 3 additional spins are awarded if Beowulf wins the fight.
Malfunction in the game voids all pays.

EXTRA WILDS and RESPINS in the
Defeat the dragon with LOCKING WILDS in the FREE SPINS !
CONGRATULATIONS YOU WON 3 EXTRA FREE SPINS
WINS MULTIPLIED BY BET PER LINE. Only the highest win per active betline is paid. Bet line wins pay if in succession from leftmost to right. Malfunction voids all pays.
3+ Free spins Scatter symbols activate free spins. Free spins continues until the Free Spin Dragon Fight feature has ended.

The Free Spins Bonus is played with a number of free spins determined by the outcome of a fight between Beowulf and the Dragon.
For each Sword symbol that appears 1 health is removed from the Dragon Health bar. For each Dragon symbol that appears 1 health is removed from the Beowulf Health bar. The Free Spins Dragon Fight bonus ends when one of the health bars is empty. 3 additional spins are awarded if Beowulf wins the fight.

The Sword symbol will remain held in its position until removed by a Dragon symbol or until Free Spin ends.
The Sword symbol is wild and substitutes for all symbols except Dragon Symbol and Free Spin scatter.

Dragon symbol removes 1 Sword symbol if there are any on the reels. The Sword symbol will expand to cover the whole reel on which it appears, and then is removed for the following free spins. If more than 1 Sword symbol is held on the reels then the Sword symbol to be removed is the first one that appeared, of those that are currently held.
The Dragon symbol is wild for all symbols except Sword wild symbol and Free Spin scatter.
The Grendel Attack feature awards a random number of Wild symbols that will lock to their positions for a set number of respins.
The number of Grendel symbols that appears on reel 5 determines the number of respins.
The locked wild symbols substitutes for all symbols except the Free Spin scatter symbol and the Regular Wild symbol.
The Grendel Attack feature is randomly triggered.
Wild symbol substitutes for all symbols except Free Spin scatter symbol, Sword bonus symbol, and Dragon bonus symbol.
Free Spins continue until Beowulf or Dragon wins +3 Spins if Beowulf wins
